required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Open-Label Trial of Peripheral Blood Progenitor Cell (PBPC) Mobilization by Filgrastim in Normal Donors
clinical_study.official_title: Open-Label Trial of Peripheral Blood Progenitor Cell (PBPC) Mobilization by Filgrastim in Normal Donors

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to clinically evaluate the spleen during PBPC mobilization by filgrastim in normal donors.

primary_outcome.measure: Spleen fold change measured by ultrasound
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before, during, and through 1 week post-PBPC mobilization and collection

secondary_outcome.measure: Spleen change associations with filgrastim dose and hematologic variables
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before, during, and through 1 week post-PBPC mobilization and collection

arm_group.description: Normal donors being treated with filgrastim for PBPC mobilization and collection

intervention.description: Normal donors being treated with filgrastim for PBPC mobilization and collection

criteria.textblock: Inclusion Criteria: - Eligible to be PBPC donor for allogeneic transplantation as determined by local institution Exclusion Criteria: - History of splenectomy - Previous PBPC mobilization attempts - Previous treatment with GCSF or GMCSF

results_reference.citation: Stiff PJ, Bensinger W, Abidi MH, Gingrich R, Artz AS, Nademanee A, Hansen KS, Sobczak C, Cutler C, Bolwell B, Shore TB, Lazarus HM, Yeager AM, Lovelace W, Guo M, Dreiling L. Clinical and ultrasonic evaluation of spleen size during peripheral blood progenitor cell mobilization by filgrastim: results of an open-label trial in normal donors. Biol Blood Marrow Transplant. 2009 Jul;15(7):827-34. doi: 10.1016/j.bbmt.2009.03.015.
